name: beam sword blade emitter
description: The blade emitter for a Rivtech beam sword.

name: beam sword blade energy channel
description: The energy channel the portal beam passes through on a Rivtech beam sword.

name: beam sword cycling field energiser
description: The field energiser that keeps the blade ignited on a Rivtech beam sword.

name: beam sword energy modulation circuit
description: An energy modulation circuit for the blade on a Rivtech beam sword.

name: beam sword focusing lens
description: A lens to help ignite and then focus the blade emitted from a Rivtech beam sword.

name: beam sword emitter matrix
description: A highly dangerous component of a Rivtech beam sword used to keep the blade from igniting the atmosphere.

name: beam sword high energy flux aperture
description: A series of ever-looping circuity from a Rivtech beam sword that hurts your eyes to try and trace.
